subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton, the Formula One championship leader, appeared to escape serious injury when he crashed into a wall during qualifying yesterday for the European Grand Prix in Nürburgring, Germany.Hamilton waved and flashed a thumbs-up sign from a stretcher before being taken by ambulance from the track. Officials said he was conscious and speaking on the way to the circuit’s medical center.McLaren officials said Hamilton, 22, would be kept in a hospital for observation for several hours. If he races, he will start from 10th on the grid.
